findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Anyone with access control from the derived contract can mint tokens.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: Anyone with access control from the derived contract can mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected finishMinting function
findings.description: The finishMinting function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized minting.

findings.title: Unprotected pay function
findings.description: The 'pay' function is external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected constructor function
findings.description: The constructor function is public and unprotected, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected decimals function
findings.description: The decimals function is public and can be modified by anyone, potentially leading to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized minting of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _finishMinting function
findings.description: The _finishMinting function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function is publicly accessible without any restrictions, allowing unauthorized users to modify allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized wallets to make transactions.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify allowance values.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to steal funds from the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The internal _mint function can be accessed without proper authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The internal _burn function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal _beforeTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected cap function
findings.description: The cap function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of critical contract variables.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: Smart contract can burn tokens from the total supply without any access control.

findings.title: Unprotected burnFrom function
findings.description: The burnFrom function can be accessed by anyone with access control from the derived contract.
